snippet: It has taken nearly two full seasons, but MetLife Stadium finally felt last Sunday like it supplied the Giants with a home-field advantage.
abstract: It has taken nearly two full seasons, but MetLife Stadium finally felt last Sunday like it supplied the Giants with a home-field advantage.
lead_paragraph: It has taken nearly two full seasons, but MetLife Stadium finally felt last Sunday like it supplied the Giants with a home-field advantage.

headline.main: Giants' New House Feels Like Home
